**Add API token support (oat) for programmatic access**

Description
-----------
Provide token-based authentication for programmatic clients (mobile apps, third-party integrations) using opaque access tokens or JWTs.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Add API token issuance and revocation endpoints.
- Protect API endpoints so that a client can authenticate using the token.
- Document how to obtain and use tokens.

Labels: backend, api, security
Estimate: small
